onModuleLoad

public void onModuleLoad()

Method called at startup

Gets localization constants from TranslateConstants, and gets list of RFID boxes from remoteInitializeBox().

Specified by:
onModuleLoad in interface com.google.gwt.core.client.EntryPoint

remoteInitializeBox

public void remoteInitializeBox()

Loads the box's configuration file

Uses ConnexionToBoxAsync to connect to local/remote box web server and sends out an AJAX request while displaying WidgetPanelLoading waiting widget.
On loading success, calls remoteGetBoxList().

remoteGetBoxList

public void remoteGetBoxList()
this method is called at the startup, to get the list of the box
